job.title: Operations Engineer, Contractor Private Cloud (VMware)
job.description: pstronguOperations Engineer Contractor Private Cloud VMwareustrongppnbspppstrongResponsibilitiesstrongpulliSupport the VMware IaaS platform and supporting infrastructure across the globe and ensure consistent availabilityliliThis includesliliUsing existing automation tools to perform daytoday operations dutiesliliDevelop automation to continue to drive proactive detection and remediation of issuesliliIdentify and tackle hardwaresoftware issues with vendorsliliRespond to inquiries and requests from other teamsliliFacilitate ticket creation and ticket assignmentliliEnforce change control processesliliMaintain good documentation and templatesliulpnbspppstrongRequirementsstrongpulli5 years of experience supporting a 24x7 production environmentlili5 years of experience building and maintaining VMware vSphere 6x platformslili3 years coding PythonliliHave working experience with Ansible git Jenkins Atlassian productsliliOther QualificationsliliExperience and knowledge in Linux support and administrationliliExperience running a fleet of servers FC switches and storageliliExperience with HashiCorp Vault is a plusliliMust possess excellent written and verbal skillsliul
